massmessage-form-subject-help:
Help text shown under the inputbox on [[Special:MassMessage]].
See also:
* {{msg-mw|massmessage-form-subject
massmessage-form-message: Used as label for a textarea on [[Special:MassMessage]].
massmessage-form-preview:
Label for the preview button on [[Special:MassMessage]].
{{Identical|Preview}}
massmessage-fieldset-preview:
Label for the fieldset box around the message preview.
{{Identical|Preview}}
massmessage-fieldset-wikitext-preview: Label for the fieldset box around the message preview in wikitext format.
massmessage-fieldset-info:
Label for the fieldset box around the delivery information
{{Identical|Information}}
massmessage-preview-count:
Text indicating how many pages the message will be sent to. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of pages
massmessage-translate-page-info: Text shown to the user if they select a translatable source page to be sent as message
massmessage-submitted:
Confirmation message the user sees after the form is submitted successfully and the request is queued in the job queue.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of deliveries that have been queued
massmessage-just-preview:
Warning to user that what they are seeing is just a preview, and they should hit the send button to actually submit it.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Massmessage-form-submit}}.
massmessage-spamlist-doesnotexist: Error message the user sees if the delivery list page or category they entered does not exist.
massmessage-spamlist-invalid: Error message the user sees if the delivery list page they entered is invalid.
massmessage-empty-subject: Error message the user sees if the no subject has been provided, that is "subject" and "section of the page to be sent as subject" are both empty.
massmessage-empty-message: Error message the user sees if the "message" and the "page to be sent as message" fields, both are empty.
massmessage-page-message-invalid:
Error message shown to the user if an invalid page has been selected to be sent as message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the title of the page message
massmessage-page-message-not-found:
Error message shown to the user if the "page selected to sent as message" was not found.

Parameters:
* $1 - the title of the page message
massmessage-page-message-no-revision:
Error message shown to the user if the "page selected to be sent as message" has no usable revision.

Parameters:
* $1 - the title of the page message
massmessage-page-message-no-revision-con:
Error message shown to the user if the "page selected to be sent as message" has no revision content.

Parameters:
* $1 - the title of the page message
* $2 - the revision ID.
massmessage-page-message-wiki-not-found:
Error message logged when the wiki containing the "page selected to sent as message", was not found.

Parameters:
* $1 - ID of the Wiki
* $2 - the title of the page message
massmessage-page-message-fetch-error-in-:
Message logged when there is an error while fetching "page selected to be sent as message" from the API.

Parameters:
* $1 - ID of the Wiki
* $2 - the title of the page message
* $3 - Error message from API
massmessage-page-message-parsing-error-i: Message logged when there is an error when parsing the JSON response while fetching "page selected to be sent as message" from the API. Parameters: * $1 - ID of the Wiki * $2 - the title of the page message * $3 - Output of json_last_error_msg
massmessage-page-message-not-found-in-wi:
Error message logged if the "page selected to sent as message" was not found in a specific wiki.

Parameters:
* $1 - ID of the Wiki
* $2 - the title of the page message
massmessage-invalid-lang:
Error message logged if the language code is invalid.

Parameters:
* $1 - Invalid language code
massmessage-page-message-parse-invalid-i:
Message logged when there is an invalid response from the API called to fetch the "page selected to be sent as message".

Parameters:
* $1 - ID of the Wiki
* $2 - the title of the page message
* $3 - Invalid response message from API
massmessage-page-message-empty: Error message shown to the user if the "page selected to sent as message" has no content.
massmessage-page-subject-empty:
Error message shown to the user if the "section selected to sent as subject" has no content. 

Parameters:
* $1 - Section name
* $2 - The title of the page message
massmessage-unescaped-langlinks: Warning shown to user when previewing if their message text has unescaped language links.
massmessage-no-timestamp: Warning shown to user when previewing if their message text does not contain a timestamp.
massmessage-form-header: Introduction text at the top of the form.
massmessage-target: {{notranslate}} Used to display the {{#target}} parserfunction. * $1 is the domain (example: "en.wikipedia.org") * $2 is $wgScriptPath (example: "/w/index.php") * $3 the page name (example: "User talk:Example")
massmessage-hidden-comment:
A hidden HTML comment that is appended after the message. Parameters:
* $1 - the username of the user who sent the message
* $2 - the database name of the wiki from where the message was sent
* $3 - the URL of the input list that was used to send the message
massmessage-optout-category: Name of category which users add pages to that will opt-it out of receiving messages.
massmessage-badhtml:
Shown in a JavaScript popup if we detect unclosed HTML tags

* $1 - comma separated list of unclosed HTML tags
* $2 - number of unclosed HTML tags
massmessage-parse-badurl:
Error message shown when the url that the user provides is invalid.
* $1 is the url the user provided
massmessage-parse-badpage:
Error message shown when the page name that the user provides is invalid.
* $1 is the page title the user provided
massmessage-global-disallowed: Error message shown if the target wiki is not the current wiki and cross-wiki messaging has been disabled (via $wgAllowGlobalMessaging).
logentry-massmessage-skipbadns:
{{logentry}}
* $4 - the subject line of the message
logentry-massmessage-skipoptout:
{{logentry}}
* $4 - the subject line of the message
logentry-massmessage-skipnouser:
{{logentry}}
* $4 - the subject line of the message
massmessage-cannot-rename: Error message a user sees when they try renaming the bot account.
massmessage-message-footer:
{{notranslate}}
The footer that is by added at the end of every message. It is left blank so individual wikis can customize it.
massmessage-nextsteps: Message after {{msg-mw|Massmessage-submitted}} on [[Special:MassMessage]] once the form has been submitted.
massmessage-content-pages: Section title for the list of pages when viewing a delivery list
massmessage-content-pagesonsite:
Subheading for the list of pages on a particular wiki
* $1 is the domain of the wiki
massmessage-content-localpages: Subheading for the list of pages on the local wiki
massmessage-content-remove:
Label for the link to remove a page from a delivery list
{{Identical|Remove}}
massmessage-content-removeerror: Error message shown when removing a page using the link next to each item failed
massmessage-content-removeconf: Confirmation message for removing a page from a delivery list
massmessage-content-removeyes:
Label for button to confirm removal
{{Identical|Remove}}
massmessage-content-removeno:
Label for button to cancel removal
{{Identical|Cancel}}
massmessage-content-empty: Message shown when viewing a delivery list if it is completely empty
massmessage-content-invalidtargets: Warning shown when viewing a delivery list that contains invalid targets
massmessage-content-emptylist:
Message that replaces a section of a delivery list (e.g. pages on a particular wiki) when all pages in the section are removed
{{Identical|None}}
massmessage-content-addheading: Heading for the form for adding pages when viewing delivery lists
massmessage-content-addtitle:
Label for the title field in the form for adding pages
{{Identical|Title}}
massmessage-content-addsite:
Label for the site field in the form for adding pages
{{Identical|Site}}
massmessage-content-addsubmit:
Used as label for the Submit button.
{{Identical|Add page}}
massmessage-content-addedlistheading: Subheading for the list of pages just added
massmessage-content-addeditem:
A target on another wiki in the list of pages just added
* $1 is a link to the target
* $2 is the domain of the wiki
{{Identical|On}}
massmessage-content-alreadyinlist: Error message shown next to form for adding pages when the page is already in the list
massmessage-content-invalidtitlesite: Error message shown next to the form for adding pages when the title and site are both invalid
massmessage-content-invalidtitle: Error message shown next to the form for adding pages when the title is invalid
massmessage-content-invalidsite: Error message shown next to the form for adding pages when the site is invalid
massmessage-content-adderror:
Error message shown next to the form for adding pages when the API request failed
* $1 is the error code
massmessage-diff-descheader: Header for the diff of the description between two revisions
massmessage-diff-targetsheader: Header for the diff of the target pages between two revisions
massmessage-ch-tojsonerror: Error message shown when the input could not be successfully encoded as a delivery list
massmessage-create-content:
Label for choosing initial list content on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]]
{{Identical|Content}}
massmessage-create-editsummary: Edit summary for creating a delivery list
massmessage-create-editsummary-import:
Edit summary for creating a delivery list with imported targets
* $1 - title of source page containing targets
* $2 - revision ID of source page
massmessage-create-editsummary-catimport:
Edit summary for creating a delivery list with targets imported from a category
* $1 - name of source category
massmessage-create-invalidtitle: Error message shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] when the title is inavlid
massmessage-create-exists: Error message shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] when a page with the title already exists
massmessage-create-nopermission: Error message shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] when the user cannot create a page with the title
massmessage-create-invalidsource: Error message shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] when the source from which to import targets is invalid or empty
massmessage-create-exists-short: Short error shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] next to the entered title when it is already in use
massmessage-create-invalidsource-short: Short error shown on [[Special:CreateMassMessageList]] next to the entered source from which to import targets when it is invalid
massmessage-edit-content:
Label for a textarea on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]]
{{Identical|Target page}}
massmessage-edit-summary:
Label for an inputbox on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]]
{{Identical|Edit summary}}
massmessage-edit-headermulti: Instructions for [[Special:EditMassMessageList]] if cross-wiki delivery is enabled
massmessage-edit-invalidtitle: Error message shown on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]] when the title is invalid
massmessage-edit-invalidtargets:
Error message shown on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]] when one or more targets are invalid.
* $1 is the number of invalid targets.
* $2 is a formatted list of invalid target strings.
massmessage-edit-missingsummary:
Warning shown on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]] to users who have chosen to be prompted about blank edit summaries.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Htmlform-submit}}.
massmessage-edit-nopermission: Error message shown on [[Special:EditMassMessageList]] when the user cannot edit the list
massmessage-summary-addremove:
Edit summary when an API request both adds and removes target pages
* $1 is the number of pages added
* $2 is the number of pages removed
massmessage-summary-addonsite:
Edit summary for adding a target page on another wiki
* $1 is the title of the page
* $2 is the domain of the wiki
massmessage-summary-addmulti:
Edit summary for adding multiple target pages. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of pages added (2 or more)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Massmessage-summary-removemulti}}
massmessage-summary-removeonsite:
Edit summary for removing a target page on another wiki
* $1 is the title of the page
* $2 is the domain of the wiki
massmessage-summary-removemulti:
Edit summary for removing multiple target pages. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of pages removed (2 or more)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Massmessage-summary-addmulti}}
massmessage-summary-addremovechange:
Edit summary when an API request both adds and removes target pages as well as changing the description
* $1 is the number of pages added
* $2 is the number of pages removed
massmessage-summary-addchange:
Edit summary for adding a target page and changing the description
* $1 is the title of the page
massmessage-summary-addonsitechange:
Edit summary for adding a target page on another wiki and changing the description
* $1 is the title of the page
* $2 is the domain of the wiki
massmessage-summary-addmultichange:
Edit summary for adding multiple target pages and changing the description. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of pages added (2 or more)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Massmessage-summary-removemultichange}}
massmessage-summary-removechange:
Edit summary for removing a target page and changing the description
* $1 is the title of the page
massmessage-summary-removeonsitechange:
Edit summary for removing a target page on another wiki and changing the description
* $1 is the title of the page
* $2 is the domain of the wiki
massmessage-summary-removemultichange:
Edit summary for removing multiple target pages and changing the description.Parameters:
* $1 - the number of pages removed (2 or more)
See also:
* {{msg-mw|Massmessage-summary-addmultichange}}
massmessage-summary-change: Edit summary for changing the description
massmessage-list-category:
{{tracking category name}}
Name for the tracking category containing all MassMessage delivery lists
massmessage-list-category-desc: Description for the tracking category containing delivery lists
tag-massmessage-delivery: Change tag for MassMessage delivery edits
tag-massmessage-delivery-description: Description for MassMessage delivery change tag
